page.title: 01WISBECH,AN INTRODUCTION.
page.content: Wisbech has a population of some 17,000 and a shopping population double that figure.The block surveyed is predominately agricultural and residential.The town is the home for firms such as :-Metal Box,Spillers,and Smedley-H.P.Most industrial activity is connected with food processing.The block contains all the major facilities in the town:-hospital, shopping,College of Further Education, schools,sports centre,theatres and cinema.Housing in the area covers all the architectural styles from Georgian to modern housing estates.The River Nene runs through the block in a form that has been much changed by man especially in the shape of flood defences.The main east-west trunk road the A47 runs around the town due to a recently built by-pass. The town has no direct rail link.
